settings.heading: "Trusted Importers of Quality Hand Tools: Torqpoint Tools"

settings.text:
Welcome to Torqpoint Tools, your go-to source for high-quality hand tools for the automotive and building industries. As a leading wholesaler and importer, we specialise in supplying our retailers and distributors with quality products at competitive prices.

With over 20 years of experience as a family-operated business we have established a reputation for delivering quality tools with great service. Our extensive range of products, including socket sets, breaker bars, spanners, drill bits, saw blades and more, are designed to meet the demanding needs of industry professionals.

We take pride in sourcing our products from reputable manufacturers in the USA, Taiwan, and China to ensure superior quality and performance. Our team is committed to providing our customers with personalised service, from selecting the right tools for your customer base to answering any technical questions you may have.

Thank you for choosing Torqpoint Tools as your preferred supplier!
